name: LegionellosisTestsForLegionellaSpeciesIgMAntibody
title: Legionellosis (Tests for Legionella species IgM Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Legionella species IgM antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Legionella IgM),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
